trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SEQ_00<tab>Regitt has a twinkle in his eye and a request on his lips.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Shigitt.
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SEQ_02<tab>Shigitt has tasked you with crafting four core components, then delivering the completed items to Regitt.
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Shigitt.

TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Regitt)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_001<tab>Our Rolling Tankards will be the culmination of much careful planning and applied theory, which is why I want to entrust the most vital elements to a master artisan of proven quality. ...Aye, that would be you!

TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_003<tab>There's much to be done, but Shigitt can give you the details─and the resources─you need to proceed. We're counting on you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_010<tab>Ready to make some core components for the Tankard, then? Glad to have you aboard.

TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_012<tab>Right, so what I need from you is four tempered nozzles, highly resistant to heat─they'll be used in the fuel injection device for emergency escapes, so we'll want to be sure they work. Start with these materials, and let me know if you need more.

TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_013<tab>Right, so what I need from you is four padded cushions for the tank's interior─we need to make sure the automaton inside is properly protected from impacts. Start with these materials, and let me know if you need more.

TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_014<tab>Right, so what I need from you is four durable tracks of rubber for the wheels─when the going gets rough, we'll want the tank to keep rolling. Start with these ingredients, and let me know if you need more.
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_016<tab>Once you're satisfied, take what you've made straight to Regitt, and he'll pass it on to the tank engineers. They're eager to put everything together!
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_017<tab>You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_018<tab>You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_019<tab>You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_020<tab>Out of materials already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_021<tab>Out of materials already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_022<tab>Out of ingredients already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What have you brought me!?

TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_031<tab>Now this is some fine work...very fine indeed! With parts of this quality, our tanks will perform even better than Watts could've imagined! Lali-ho-ho-ho, I am moved to tears! Flabbergasted! Duly impressed!

TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_032<tab>...Uh, not that I'm trying to flatter you so you'll accept an even more difficult task next time or anything like that! I just...know how to appreciate true artisanship! Yes!
